mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet ( w_code, planner_code ) VALUES ( seq_w_code.nextval, #{value} )

INSERT INTO wallet_detail ( w_detail_code, w_code, part, money_unit, expression, price, krw_price, reg_date, reg_time, item, content, pay_option, exchange_rate, category, w_image ) VALUES ( seq_w_detail_code.nextval, #{walletCode}, #{part}, #{moneyUnit}, #{expression}, #{price}, #{krwPrice}, #{regDate}, #{regTime}, #{item:VARCHAR}, #{content:VARCHAR}, #{payOption}, #{exchangeRate:NUMERIC}, #{category}, #{walletImage:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT w_detail_code, w_code, part, money_unit, expression, price, krw_price, reg_date, reg_time, item, content, pay_option, exchange_rate, category, w_image FROM wallet_detail WHERE w_detail_code = #{value}
SELECT reg_date FROM wallet_detail WHERE w_code = #{value} AND category < '9' GROUP BY reg_date

SELECT NVL(wd.krw_price, 0) FROM wallet w, ( SELECT SUM(krw_price) krw_price, w_code FROM wallet_detail WHERE part = #{part} AND category < '9' GROUP BY w_code ) wd WHERE w.w_code = wd.w_code(+) AND w.w_code = #{walletCode}
SELECT SUM(krw_price) krw_price, category FROM wallet_detail WHERE w_code = #{value} AND part = 1 AND category < '9' GROUP BY category
